apps.localizedDescription: Cercube not only gives you the features that are missing from YouTube, but it also gives you full control over the app.
apps.name: Cercube+
apps.subtitle: Cercube+ for YouTube
apps.versionDescription:
Changelog:
- Update YouTube base to 16.42.3

For full changelog, visit https://apt.alfhaily.me/changelogs/FDXO5R

permissions.usageDescription: This lets you create videos using the app.
This lets you upload videos you've already created.
YouTube needs bluetooth access to scan for nearby Cast devices.
Your contacts will be sent to YouTube servers to help you find friends to share videos with.
Access to your network allows YouTube to discover and connect to devices such as your TV.
This lets you add your own audio files to your videos.
This lets you include audio with your videos and search using your voice.
Makes it easier for you to attach location information to your videos and live streams and allows for features such as improved recommendations and ads.
YouTube can continue running while in the background.
YouTube can continue playing audio while in the background.

apps.localizedDescription:
Unfortunately, AltStore can not handle two applications that have the same bundle ID (uYou+ and Cercube+). I have no other choice except to modify CercubePlus's bundle ID. As a result, you won't be able to install CercubePlus directly through AltStore. You still can download the IPA like normal though.

Full infomation about CercubePlus (Cercube+) is available on my Github: https://github.com/qnblackcat/CercubePlus/

Credits: Please keep the Credits if you re-up CercubePlus! 
- Alfhaily for Cercube.
- Galactic-Dev for the original iSponsorBlock, @Luewii for his fork of iSponsorBlock (which works in jailed mode).
- PoomSmart for YouRememberCaption, YTClassicVideoQuality, YTNoCheckLocalNetwork, YTSystemAppearance, YTUHD, YouPiP and Return YouTube Dislike.
- level3tjg for YTNoHoverCards.

Known issues:
- Hide Cast button may not work.
- YTUHD: Stuttering on 2K/4K videos.
- YouPiP (iOS 14.0 - 14.4.2): due to Apple's fault, you may encounter the speedup-bug as described here. The bug also happens when you try to play multi-sources of sound at the same time. Enable Legacy PiP is a workaround. Note that Legacy PiP removes UHD quality and breaks the default video quality feature of uYou. Use it at your own risk!
apps.name: CercubePlus (Cercube+)
apps.subtitle: Cercube with extra features! Requires iOS 13.0 and later.
apps.versionDescription:
v17.26.2 (5.3.10): The changelog can be found at
https://github.com/qnblackcat/CercubePlus/releases/latest
